-- | A logging framework for Haskell
--   
--   A logging framework for Haskell
@package logsink
@version 0.1.0

module System.Logging.LogSink.Format
type Format = LogRecord -> IO String
defaultFormatString :: String
parseFormat :: String -> Either String Format
data Node
Level :: Node
Message :: Node
Timestamp :: Node
ThreadId :: Node
Literal :: String -> Node
formatNodes :: [Node] -> LogRecord -> IO String
parseNodes :: String -> Either String [Node]
instance Eq Node
instance Show Node

module System.Logging.LogSink.Core
type Format = LogRecord -> IO String
defaultFormat :: Format
stdErrSink :: Format -> LogSink
sysLogSink :: Format -> LogSink
combine :: [LogSink] -> LogSink
filterByLogLevel :: LogLevel -> LogSink -> LogSink

module System.Logging.LogSink.Config
data SinkConfig
SinkConfig :: LogLevel -> String -> LogTarget -> SinkConfig
sinkConfigLevel :: SinkConfig -> LogLevel
sinkConfigFormat :: SinkConfig -> String
sinkConfigTarget :: SinkConfig -> LogTarget
defaultSinkConfig :: SinkConfig
data LogLevel :: *
TRACE :: LogLevel
DEBUG :: LogLevel
INFO :: LogLevel
WARN :: LogLevel
ERROR :: LogLevel
data LogTarget
StdErr :: LogTarget
SysLog :: LogTarget
toLogSink :: SinkConfig -> Either String LogSink
setupLogging :: [SinkConfig] -> IO ()
instance Eq LogTarget
instance Show LogTarget
instance Eq SinkConfig
instance Show SinkConfig
